content:
I'm trying to debug some code of mine using set_option trace.Meta.isDefEq true, and I expected the trace messages to be properly indented when I expand/collapse them. This was how vscode-lean4 used to behave at some point, but now all the messages appear on the same level, which makes them very hard to read...

How do I fix this? I've been searching in issues on github and there's no report of that problem, so I guess this is something that's happening only to me and I wonder if that's because there's something wrong with my setup.

lean4: v4.15.0
vscode-lean4: v0.0.191
Thanks! Turns out the right keyword was "nesting" and not "indent" haha
Julien Marquet-Wagner has marked this topic as resolved.
